mapper.insert: INSERT INTO club_user_list (user_id, club_id, role) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{club_id}, #{role})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, club_id, role FROM club_user_list WHERE club_id = #{club_id} AND role = 'MASTER'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM club_user_list WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND club_id = #{club_id}
mapper.select: select cs.user_id "cs_uid", cs.club_id "cs_cid", cs.role "cs_role", c.id "c_id", c.name "c_name", c.category "c_category", c.detail_category "c_detail_category", c.intro "c_inrto", c.representative_picture "c_representative_picture" FROM CLUB_USER_LIST cs, CLUB c WHERE cs.club_id = c.id;
